text:
İbrahim Ayhan (10 February 1968 – 20 September 2018) was a Turkish politician. He was of Kurdish origin. He was a Member of Parliament for his hometown of Şanlıurfa from 12 June 2011 until his death. He was born in Siverek, Turkey.
Ayhan died on 20 September 2018 in Erbil, Turkey from a heart attack, aged 50.
